description:
On the day of the game, a lot of people come to Washnomori High School to cheer them on. 
Every coach and press from the prefecture is at Washnomori High School. They are surprised to see Keiyo`s Fall Champion Team playing the game.
The game is starting, Keiyo bats first. Sakamoto throws three strikeouts in a row. The Keiyo players had enough fun and are going to play this game seriously.
The Keiyo pitcher, Hosogoe, strikes the batters out with frightening breaking balls and Washinomori has a three up, three down inning. Sakamoto has amazing strength and Hosogoe has brilliant techniques. Kurokan says the win or lose of this game depends on who gets the most strikeouts.
Source: crunchyroll
